name: Selectrum
description:
There are 3 dimensions with different coloured creatures.

The creatures breed on contact and their offspring will be a blend of the parent's colours.

Your goal is to breed the creatures such that the average colour in each dimension matches the target colour for that dimension.

You must avoid overpopulation. If the breeding gets out of control, you will fail the experiment.


Controls

Left Click Pick Up + Move Creature Spacebar Switch to another dimension WASD Move Camera Scroll Wheel Zoom Camera




Selectrum was made in 6 hours (lol) for Tri-Jam #169. Thanks everyone for checking it out!
